title: Drawing, "Design for Trophy with Military Attributes", 1770
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on white laid paper
markings: Verso, two stamps: Cooper Union Museum, New York, 457e
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Military trophy consisting of a helmet, shield, banners, arrows, and hatchets.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Trophy with Military Attributes", 1770.
1770. Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-58.
